availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Albert Gallatin Donoho (Obion County, TN farmer. (Hickman Co. petition signer 1864))

body.p: Obion County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Ruth Kerley Donoho. Father of Noel Donoho. Farmer in Macon County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Obion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Macon County, District 12, p. 199A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Obion County, District 12, p. 137.
Tennessee Death Certificates, 1908-1965, Tennessee Death Records, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, File #1381.
